snippet: Rollins connected on a two-run homer and Cliff Lee pitched seven strong innings to lead the streaking Phillies to their seventh straight win, beating the Marlins on Wednesday.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Philadelphia Phillies win their seventh straight game, defeating Miami Marlins, 3-1; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Rollins connected on a two-run homer and Cliff Lee pitched seven strong innings to lead the streaking Phillies to their seventh straight win, beating the Marlins on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Phillies Win Seventh Straight to Draw Closer in Wild-Card Race
headline.main: Phillies Win Seventh Straight To Draw Closer to Wild Card
headline.print_headline: Phillies Win Seventh Straight To Draw Closer to Wild Card
